mapper.update:
update toa_shjfgl_equipment_move set
EQUIPMENT_NUMBER=#{equipmentNumber},
EQUIPMENT_ID=#{equipmentId},
COMPANY_ID=#{companyId},
COMPANY_NAME=#{companyName},
CONTACT=#{contact},
CONTACT_WAY=#{contactWay},
CABINET=#{cabinet},
IP=#{ip},
SN=#{sn},
BRAND=#{brand},
MACHINA=#{machina},
CAOZGCS=#{caozgcs},
CAOZGCS_NAME=#{caozgcsName},
STATUS=#{status},
WARN_DATE=#{warnDate},
START_DATE=#{startDate},
END_DATE=#{endDate},
ARRIVAL_DATE=#{arrivalDate},
SHELF_DATE=#{shelfDate},
ARRIVAL_NEW_DATE=#{arrivalNewDate},
BUILD_DATE=#{buildDate},
WORK_TIME=#{workTime},
STORAGE_LOCATION=#{storageLocation},
CONNECTION_REQUIREMENTS=#{connectionRequirements},
CABLE_USAGE=#{cableUsage},
INSTALL_SYSTEM=#{installSystem},
IP_CONFIGURATION=#{ipConfiguration},
IP_EMLY=#{ipEmly},
REMOTE_SHUTDOWN=#{remoteShutdown},
SHELF_REQUIREMENTS=#{shelfRequirements},
CABINET_SPACE=#{cabinetSpace},
CABINET_POWER=#{cabinetPower},
CHECK_AGAINST=#{checkAgainst},
POWER_OFF=#{powerOff},
EQUIPMENT_CONSTRUCTION=#{equipmentConstruction},
MORMAL_EQUIPMENT=#{mormalEquipment},
HAVE_AFTER_OPERATE=#{haveAfterOperate},
REGION_INFORMATION=#{regionInformation},
OPERATION_TYPE=#{operationType},
OPERATION_TYPE_IMG=#{operationTypeImg},
REMARK=#{remark},
DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT=#{createUserDept},
CREATE_DATE=#{createDate},
MODIFY_USER=#{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE=#{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1=#{extStr1},
EXT_STR2=#{extStr2},
EXT_STR3=#{extStr3},
EXT_STR4=#{extStr4},
EXT_STR5=#{extStr5},
EXT_DATE1=#{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2=#{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1=#{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2=#{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3=#{extNum3},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
